name: Utopia (itch) (Smyles9)
description:
Welcome to the chaotic city of Utopia! Overthrown by elite mercenaries Nine must traverse the city and mow down and incapacitate the enemies while trying to escape  without being captured by the mercenaries.

Features

  • 1 playable level
  • 2 unique power-ups
    •  Instakill and Heart canisters
  • Random enemy spawns
  • Waves of enemies
